doc.title: How to Manifest a Beautiful Life
doc.plot: Millions of Americans are at a crossroads. We're faced with doing more of the same but wanting a different outcome. We want to be happier, healthier, and more at peace with ourselves. We want joy and love. But now for the hard part. Are these desires and wishes compatible with our actions and choices? This program explores how to make positive changes so that we can achieve more of what we want out of life. What does it really take to have a beautiful life? Where do our illusions begin? Do we listen carefully? What happens when we have consciousness without thought? Should you live with the flow or move against it?
